016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.jsonapi.resources;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity.Command;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity.annotation.Update;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Link;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Links;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources.ResourceContext;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.JsonSchema;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Properties;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Types;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.server.annotations.AttributeSchema;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.BeanProperty;
028import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
029import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException;
030import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatVisitable;
031import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatVisitorWrapper;
032import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonObjectFormatVisitor;
033import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
034
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.Arrays;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.function.Consumer;
039
040import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.MediaTypes.APPLICATION_JSON_API;
041
042public interface CommandsJsonSchemaMixin
043        extends ResourceContext
044{
045    // JSON Schema builders
046    default Consumer<Links.Builder> commands(Class<?>... commandClasses) {
047        return links ->
048        {
049            for (Class<?> clazz : commandClasses) {
050
051                // Check if this is an enclosing class
052                commands(clazz.getClasses()).accept(links);
053
054                if (!Command.class.isAssignableFrom(clazz))
055                    continue;
056
057                Class<? extends Command> commandClass = (Class<? extends Command>) clazz;
058
059                final List<BeanProperty> commandProperties = new ArrayList<>();
060                try {
061                    objectMapper().acceptJsonFormatVisitor(commandClass, new JsonFormatVisitorWrapper.Base() {
062                        @Override
063                        public JsonObjectFormatVisitor expectObjectFormat(JavaType type) throws JsonMappingException {
064                            return new JsonObjectFormatVisitor.Base() {
065                                @Override
066                                public void property(BeanProperty prop) throws JsonMappingException {
067                                    commandProperties.add(prop);
068                                }
069
070                                @Override
071                                public void property(String name, JsonFormatVisitable handler, JavaType propertyTypeHint) throws JsonMappingException {
072                                    super.property(name, handler, propertyTypeHint);
073                                }
074
075                                @Override
076                                public void optionalProperty(BeanProperty prop) throws JsonMappingException {
077                                    commandProperties.add(prop);
078                                }
079
080                                @Override
081                                public void optionalProperty(String name, JsonFormatVisitable handler, JavaType propertyTypeHint) throws JsonMappingException {
082                                    super.optionalProperty(name, handler, propertyTypeHint);
083                                }
084                            };
085                        }
086                    });
087                } catch (JsonMappingException e) {
088                    throw new RuntimeException(e);
089                }
090
091                String submissionMediaType = APPLICATION_JSON_API;
092
093                List<String> required = new ArrayList<>();
094
095                Properties.Builder properties = new Properties.Builder();
096                for (BeanProperty property : commandProperties) {
097/*
098                if ( field.getType().equals( BodyPart.class ) )
099                {
100                    submissionMediaType = MultiPartMediaTypes.MULTIPART_MIXED;
101                    continue;
102                }
103*/
104                    JsonSchema.Builder builder = new JsonSchema.Builder()
105                            .type(Types.typeOf(property.getType().getRawClass()))
106                            .title(property.getName());
107
108                    AttributeSchema schema = property.getAnnotation(AttributeSchema.class);
109                    if (schema != null) {
110                        if (schema.required()) {
111                            required.add(property.getName());
112                        }
113
114                        builder.title(schema.title())
115                                .description(schema.description());
116                    } else {
117                        builder.title(property.getName());
118                        required.add(property.getName());
119                    }
120
121                    if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(property.getType().getRawClass())) {
122                        builder.enums(Arrays
123                                .stream((Enum<?>[]) property.getType().getRawClass().getEnumConstants())
124                                .map(Enum::name)
125                                .toArray(String[]::new));
126                    }
127
128                    properties.property(property.getName(), builder.build());
129                }
130
131                String commandName = Command.getName(commandClass);
132
133                JsonSchema commandSchema = new JsonSchema.Builder()
134                        .type(Types.Object)
135                        .properties(new Properties.Builder()
136                                .property("data", new JsonSchema.Builder()
137                                        .type(Types.Object)
138                                        .additionalProperties(false)
139                                        .required("type", "data")
140                                        .properties(new Properties.Builder()
141                                                .property("id", new JsonSchema.Builder().type(Types.String).build())
142                                                .property("type", new JsonSchema.Builder().constant(JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(commandName)).build())
143                                                .property("attributes", new JsonSchema.Builder()
144                                                        .type(Types.Object)
145                                                        .required(required.toArray(new String[0]))
146                                                        .properties(properties.build())
147                                                        .build())
148                                                .build())
149                                        .build())
150                                .build())
151                        .build();
152
153                Link.Builder builder = new Link.Builder()
154                        .rel(commandName)
155                        .href("{+command_href}")
156                        .templateRequired("command_href")
157                        .templatePointer("command_href", "0/data/links/" + commandName)
158                        .submissionMediaType(submissionMediaType);
159
160                if (commandClass.isAnnotationPresent(Update.class)) {
161                    builder.targetSchema(commandSchema);
162                } else {
163                    builder.submissionSchema(commandSchema);
164                }
165
166                links.link(builder.build());
167            }
168        };
169    }
170}
